name: THE ZACHTRONICS PUZZLE PACK
description:
This bundle features eight of Zachtronics' most celebrated puzzle games:
  • SpaceChem
  • Infinifactory
  • TIS-100
  • SHENZHEN I/O
  • Opus Magnum
  • EXAPUNKS
  • MOLEK-SYNTEZ
  • Last Call BBS

System requirements, supported languages, and features may vary between games - please check individual product pages for details.
